title: IT'S ANOTHER CASE OF THE FIZZ! Kindred's Passive has no Damage Cap on Monsters

replies.body: Odd, there's definitely a limit on monsters in Kindred's script that's worked in the past. Must be bugged, thanks for the heads up.
Kindred passive is Current % HP so you'd need a LOT of stacks to get there. Good luck spending those hours in custom matches so you can 6 shot Baron/Vilemaw.
took one hour of straight up kill farming bots to kill baron in 6 seconds
Wow, and I thought I had no life. LOL
im on break so i no life everything i can

Nasus Q, Veigar AP infinite, Sion health stacking, and Thresh soul armor and AP. 

It's been done before.

To do that you would need to be so freaking ahead that any champion with this much lead could 6 shot a Vilemaw (even {{champion:432}}), I feel like with the release of Kindered people complain just for the sake of complaining

Passive that increases damage after a champ kill iir c.
if that is the case he is speaking of an unrealistic scenario that would never normally occur in game.
